p: Adenoviruses are non-enveloped, double-stranded DNA viruses that form the Adenoviridae family. Six subgenera (Aâ€“F) and 51 human serotypes of adenoviruses have been described [ 22]. Adenoviruses have an icosahedral capsid made of 250 protein subunits called capsomeres [ 23]. Humans are the only natural hosts of these viruses.
